description: Acids will react with bases to form water and salt.
heading: "Bases","Corrosive","Acids","Hydrolysis","Salts","Ions"
head_description: "Substances whose aqueous solutions are characterized by bitter taste, slippery to touch, the ability to turn red litmus paper blue.","Property of any material that causes gradual deterioration.","Substances whose aqueous solutions are characterized by sour taste, the ability to turn blue litmus red.","Decomposition of chemical compound by reaction with water.","chemical compounds formed from the reaction of an acid with a base.","Atoms which either gained electrons or lost their valence electrons."
